default.title: Eat Smart AI - Your Personal Nutrition Assistant
default.description: AI-powered nutrition tracking, meal planning, and dietary guidance.

analyzer.title: Food Analyzer
analyzer.description: Analyze any food with AI to get detailed nutritional information instantly. Simply snap a photo or describe your meal.

tracker.title: Nutrition Tracker
tracker.description: Track your daily nutrition intake, monitor calories, macros, and micronutrients with AI-powered food analysis.

mealPlanner.title: Meal Planner
mealPlanner.description: Plan your meals for the week with personalized recommendations based on your dietary goals.

foodAnalyzer.title: Food Analyzer
foodAnalyzer.description: Analyze any food with AI to get detailed nutritional information instantly.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your account settings, dietary preferences, and nutrition goals.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: View your nutrition overview, recent meals, and progress towards your goals.

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.description: Ask nutrition questions and get instant AI-powered dietary guidance and meal suggestions.

dailySummaries.title: Daily Summaries
dailySummaries.description: Track your nutrition progress over time with detailed daily summaries and trends.

mealPlanner.title: Smart Meal Planner
mealPlanner.subtitle: AI-Powered Personalized Nutrition
mealPlanner.generatePlanInfo: Generate a personalized meal plan based on your health goals and dietary preferences using Ernie AI.

personalGoals.title: Personal Goals
personalGoals.subtitle: Set your nutrition and health objectives
personalGoals.validationError: Please fill in all nutrition goals with values greater than 0

errors.calorieInvalid: Daily calorie goal must be greater than 0
errors.proteinInvalid: Daily protein goal must be greater than 0
errors.carbsInvalid: Daily carbs goal must be greater than 0
errors.fatsInvalid: Daily fats goal must be greater than 0

notifications.title: Notifications

legal.title: About & Legal
legal.disclaimerText: This app provides nutritional information and dietary guidance for educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before making any dietary changes, especially if you have medical conditions or concerns.
